page.title: 11 POLITICS IN NORTHAMPTON
page.content: Northampton is a Conservative controlled town. This may not have been so if the Independents had not joined forces with them against Labour. After the last election the results were:- Conservatives.....34 seats; Labour............29 seats; The SDP........... 4 seats; Liberal Alliance.. 1 seat. The leader of the conservatives in Northampton is W.D. Norton, who has a C.B.E. Some of the most interesting debates in the council chamber concern the future development of the town. For example, a long-standing debate which has caused much heated discussion is the somewhat controversial proposal to replace the cobbles in the market square with new ones. Although intended to help preserve the traditional characteristics of the town such a scheme is considered expensive.
